doc:
Edward Tudor-Pole https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Tudor-Pole 0 Edward Felix Tudor-Pole (also known as Edward Tenpole; born 6 December 1955) is an English musician, television presenter and actor. Originally gaining fame in the United Kingdom in the late 1970s as the lead singer of the punk rock band Tenpole Tudor, Tudor-Pole began an acting career following the group's split in 1982. Outside of his music career Tudor-Pole is probably best known in the UK as the presenter of the game show The Crystal Maze from 1993 to 1995 and in the US for his roles as Enaros in the 1997 fantasy film Kull the Conqueror and Mr. Borgin in The Harry Potter film series. Edward_Felix_Tudor-Pole ( also_known as Edward_Tenpole ; born_6_December_1955 ) is an_English_musician , television_presenter_and_actor . Originally gaining fame in the_United_Kingdom in the_late_1970s as the_lead_singer of the_punk_rock_band_Tenpole_Tudor , Tudor-Pole began an_acting_career following the_group 's_split in 1982 . Outside_of his_music_career Tudor-Pole is_probably_best_known in the_UK as the_presenter of the_game show The_Crystal_Maze from 1993 to 1995 and in the_US for his_roles as Enaros in the_1997_fantasy_film Kull the_Conqueror and Mr._Borgin in The_Harry_Potter_film_series .
